title: Lead Organizer of a Blood Donation Drive
description: Oversaw close to 1000+ students actively participating in the Donation Drive which was organized at JSS Institute of technical Education, Bengaluru.

title: Volunteer at Yodha
description: Yodha is a social service club. We organized and conducted various social service events in Bangalore.

title: Vounteer at Ramose Foundation
description: RA-MOSE foundation is an NGO focused on service activities in the field of education. I took part actively in donating books and study kits to needy students and empower them with knowledge.
